<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Enregistrer des symptômes"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/cycle/symptoms"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Logger les symptômes ressentis pour une date donnée

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"date":{"type":"string","description":"Date des symptômes","example":"2024-01-15","format":"date"},"symptoms":{"description":"Liste des symptômes ressentis","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","description":"Type de symptôme","enum":["CRAMPS","BLOATING","HEADACHE","BACK_PAIN","BREAST_TENDERNESS","ACNE","MOOD_SWINGS","FATIGUE","NAUSEA","FOOD_CRAVINGS","CONSTIPATION","DIARRHEA","HOT_FLASHES","COLD_FLASHES","JOINT_PAIN","INSOMNIA"],"example":"CRAMPS"},"intensity":{"type":"number","description":"Intensité du symptôme (1=léger, 5=très fort)","example":3,"minimum":1,"maximum":5},"notes":{"type":"string","description":"Notes sur le symptôme","example":"Crampes légères le matin, soulagées par chaleur"}},"required":["type","intensity"],"title":"LogSymptomDto"}}},"required":["date","symptoms"],"title":"LogSymptomsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Symptômes enregistrés avec succès","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"symptoms":{"description":"Symptômes enregistrés","type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifiant du symptôme","example":"symptom_123456789"},"type":{"type":"string","description":"Type de symptôme","enum":["CRAMPS","BLOATING","HEADACHE","BACK_PAIN","BREAST_TENDERNESS","ACNE","MOOD_SWINGS","FATIGUE","NAUSEA","FOOD_CRAVINGS","CONSTIPATION","DIARRHEA","HOT_FLASHES","COLD_FLASHES","JOINT_PAIN","INSOMNIA"],"example":"CRAMPS"},"intensity":{"type":"number","description":"Intensité (1-5)","example":3},"notes":{"type":"string","description":"Notes sur le symptôme","example":"Crampes légères le matin"},"date":{"type":"string","description":"Date du symptôme","example":"2024-01-15T00:00:00.000Z"},"createdAt":{"type":"string","description":"Date de création","example":"2024-01-15T10:30:00.000Z"}},"required":["id","type","intensity","date","createdAt"],"title":"SymptomEntryDto"}},"date":{"type":"string","description":"Date des symptômes","example":"2024-01-15"},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Message de confirmation","example":"3 symptômes enregistrés pour le 15 janvier 2024"}},"required":["symptoms","date","message"],"title":"LogSymptomsResponseDto"}}}},"400":{"description":"Données invalides"}}}
 id="cycle-controller-log-symptoms-responses">
  
</StatusCodes>
